description: Manage private link of an application gateway.

commands.name: az network application-gateway private-link add
commands.summary: Add a new private link with a default IP configuration and associate it with an existing frontend IP.
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway private-link add --frontend-ip
                                                --gateway-name
                                                --name
                                                --resource-group
                                                --subnet
                                                [--ip-address]
                                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--primary {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--subnet-prefix]
examples: az network application-gateway private-link add -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyGateway --name MyPrivateLink --frontend-ip MyFrontendIP --subnet MySubnet --subnet-prefix MyPrefix

commands.name: az network application-gateway private-link list
examples: az network application-gateway private-link list -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyGateway

commands.name: az network application-gateway private-link remove
commands.summary: Remove a private link and clear association with Frontend IP. The subnet associate with a private link might need to clear manually.
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway private-link remove --gateway-name
                                                   --name
                                                   --resource-group
                                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                   [--yes]
examples: az network application-gateway private-link remove -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyGateway --name MyPrivateLink --yes

commands.name: az network application-gateway private-link show
examples: az network application-gateway private-link show -n MyPrivateLink -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyGateway

commands.name: az network application-gateway private-link wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
